source.06c4cb75:
plt.scatter(df['time'],df['price'],color='green',marker='*')

plt.xlabel('time')
plt.ylabel('price')
plt.legend()
plt.title('Time vs Price')

plt.show()
source.55b31733:
# Bidders vs Time
plt.scatter(df['bidders'],df['price'],color='blue',marker='*')
plt.xlabel('bidders')
plt.ylabel('price')
plt.legend()
plt.title('Bidders vs price')

plt.show()
